jain.protocol.ip.sip.header
Interface NameAddressHeader

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Header, Parameters, ParametersHeader, java.io.Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContactHeader, EndPointHeader, FromHeader, RecordRouteHeader, RouteHeader, ToHeader
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContactHeaderImpl, FromHeaderImpl, RecordRouteHeaderImpl, RouteHeaderImpl, ToHeaderImpl
public interface NameAddressHeader
extends ParametersHeader

This interface represents any header that contains a NameAddress value. It is the super-interface of ContactHeader, EndPointHeader, RouteHeader and RecordRouteHeader.

See Also:
ContactHeader, EndPointHeader, RouteHeader, RecordRouteHeader

Method Summary
